name: HexZen (kreivi)
description:
HexZen Relax and place some tiles. Grow your world hex by hex without stressing about scores or timers. Controls WASD - Camera movement Left Mouse Button - (Re)Place tile Right Mouse Button - Discard tile

Mouse Wheel Up/Down - Rotate tile


Additional information This game was entry for GoGodotJam. Jam duration was 9 days and theme was Growth. Resources
  • Hexagon Kit by Kenney Vleugels
  • GDHexGrid by Mel Collins
  • Camera Gimbal by KidsCanCode
  • Tangerine Font by Toshi Omagari
